Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near 75th/State
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted EB: State, 76th, King Dr, and 75th; WB: 75th, King Dr, 76th, Lafayette, and 79th due to, street blockage near 75th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 75th/State, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via State, 76th, King Drive, and 75th.

Westbound buses will operate via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Lafayette, and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
